summary: REQ-1, REQ-2, and REQ-4 appear implemented via a build-time version constant (VITE_APP_VERSION), an always-visible version badge (Footer + authenticated AppLayout), a Deployment Info page/route, and a non-blocking warning when the frontend version is not 242. REQ-3 is not confirmed by the diff summary: the frontend calls actor.getBackendVersion(), but the backend diff excerpt does not show an exposed query method, and the backend version constant shown is formatted as "2.4.2" rather than "242".

missing_requirements.requirement: Expose a backend query method that returns a backend build/version identifier so the frontend can display both frontend and backend versions for deployment verification.
missing_requirements.reason: The frontend hook calls actor.getBackendVersion(), but the backend diff excerpt does not show any public query method (e.g., getBackendVersion) being added/exposed. Also, the only backend version indicator shown is a constant formatted as "2.4.2", not clearly the required "242" string.

hallucinated_features.description: Large-scale enhancements/changes to multiple finance and content pages (Dashboard, Analytics, Transactions, AIInsights, Home, Settings, FinanceBlog, etc.) beyond adding version visibility and deployment verification.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists non-goals about changing existing finance features/content beyond adding version visibility and deployment verification, but the diff summary indicates substantial feature expansions across many pages.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes involving quiz functionality within shared query hooks (mock localStorage implementations including quiz).
hallucinated_features.reason: Constraints say not to modify quiz-related files unless fixing critical bugs, but the diff summary states useQueries includes quiz functionality changes; no critical quiz bug fix requirement is stated in the BuildRequest.
